content: I've been thinking about my past family trips and how they compare to my solo travels. Speaking of which, I remember our last family trip to Hawaii was amazing, but it was so hectic managing the kids' schedules and nap times. Anyway, back to my solo travel plans... I think I'm leaning towards Medellín, Colombia. Can you tell me more about the safety concerns I should be aware of, and any must-see attractions or neighborhoods I shouldn't miss?
